"Okay Bloom try to catch me!"

It was vacation. Bloom and Locket were playing catch the elf. A game where Bloom needed to catch Locket. Vacation was almost over. Tomorrow Stella would pick them up. But they still had one free day.
Locket flew a little outside Bloom's reach. But with one high jump Bloom grabbed Locket by her leg.
"Ha! Got you."
"Hey can you two come in?" Blooms mother asked.
Blooms mother couldn't see the elf but Bloom told her enough to know that there was a elf. Even if she was invisible.
"We have some lunch."
"Coming mom."
And the two of them walked in.
"Because this is your last day we have some pancakes for lunch. And for dinner... that's a surprise."
"I love pancakes. special with syrup and sugar."
Locket landed on table.
"I also like pancakes."
Bloom took one pancake for herself and one for Locket.
Bloom's father looked confused at the for him disappearing pancake.
"Dad. It's Locket."
"Yeah right. Listen Bloom. We can't see those elf. Would't it be easier to take a pet we could see?'
"Come on Mike. That little elf never give us any trouble. And she is popular by the children in the shop."
"Yeah dad. You know kids can see elf's." And she took a second pancake.
"I wish i could see her."
"Sorry dad you can't. But i could make a drawing of her. Then you know how she looks."
"What do you want to do today?"
"Ride on my bike."
"That's a good idea. It's good to do some exercise." Locket said.

After lunch Bloom took her bike.
"So where did you want to go?"
"To the park."
A little later Bloom locked her bike to the fence of the park
"It's really nice weather."
There were't many people in the park. Bloom went to a place in the grass and let herself fall down.
"Ah! Nice in the sun."
Locket landed on her belly and started to giggle.
"What is it Locket?"
"Your Belly. It's a lot softer and bigger then before the vacation. It feels nice."
Bloom looked at her with a worried face.
"What's wrong Bloom."
"Locket i gained six pounds this vacation!"

1112121122.content:
Bloom grew more and more tired as the pixies stuffed her and her friends. She though that this was because of the eating, but it was actually magic flowing out of her in massive amounts, changing reality itself to match her dream. Finally Bloom fell asleep in her dream, stuffed past the limit, and in a small food induced coma.

Then her eyes snapped open, and she looked at the sun streaming through her window. Bloom got out of bed, noticing that it was a lot harder than usual. she went into her bathroom looked into a mirror to check her hair, and saw her new size. Her large fattened breasts were resting on top of her gigantic belly. Her rear was the size of a whole couch, and her thighs were as thick as trees to support her. Her torso was quite wide and was covered in love handles. Strangely, Bloom found none of this unusual, and stepped into her shower.

20 minutes later, as Bloom was drying off her now 550lb body, her cell phone rang. When Bloom picked up the phone, she heard Stella's voice.

"Good morning Bloom," Stella said, "hope your all packed up cause I'm coming to pick you up at noon."

"Of course I'm packed Stella," Bloom said, "I wouldn't want us to be late and let the other girls get all the really fattening food. I just have to go hug mom good-bye, and eat my breakfast, then I'll get to the pick-up spot."

"Ok, see you soon," Stella said while hanging up.

Bloom put on her XXXL t-shirt, and her XXXL jeans and headed down stairs for breakfast.

"Good morning mom," Bloom said as she sat down on the two chairs she needed to support her weight.

"Good morning Bloom," said her 700lb mother, who except for her hair and face, was a larger version of Bloom.

"Gotta go to school today," Bloom said while begining to wolf down the breakfast that covered the whole table.

"Your father and I will miss you as usual, but your big enough to take care of yourself," Bloom's mom said while patting Bloom's belly.

"Aw mom, you know I'll call," Bloom said.

An hour later Bloom let out a loud belch, having finished her send off breakfast, and probably adding another 3 pounds to her frame. Then she grabbed her suitcase and walked out of the house. Due to her size it took her an hour to get to the pick up site. Bloom arrived just in time to see the spaceship she and the rest of the Winx club used to get to Alfea. Stella stepped out the door, in the 500lb body from Bloom's dream and helped her up the stairs to the entryway.

"Well Bloom, it's time to go get the others," Stella said while munching on a large burger she had brought.

"Yep, let's go," Bloom said as she strapped into the pilots seat.

STella always let Bloom fly the pickup route because the distance from Solaria to Earth was greater than the rest of the entire trip. Plus Stella knew Bloom loved flying in both spaceships, and with her own wings.

1511122.content:
June woke up the next morning; the first thing she saw was Ray Ray sitting on her bed with a worried look on his face.

"JUNE!!!"

"AHH! RAY RAY! Don't do that!" As June got up, she asked, "What's wrong? Why'd you have to wake me up like that?"

"Look out your window! NOW!!"

June looked and saw an entire horde of creatures made of candy. The part Ray Ray was concerned about, though, was that everyone in the city could see them. They were panicking in the streets as the creatures ran amok.

"What the? How the?"

"Told ya! So, we gonna eat them or what?" Ray Ray was waiting for the call to action, but June replied, "I think we need to see Ah-Mah first, bro. There's a reason the Veil is down, and she should know about it (The Veil prevents magical creatures from being seen by humans.)

"Hey, you two know why I don't need amulets to see these freaks?" Dennis, the oldest of the three siblings, just arrived upstairs wondering what was happening (Late in the series, June and Ray Ray let Dennis in on their secrets; since he never naturally acquired magic powers, except for resistance to memory loss, he needs special items to see magical creatures.).

"We were just going to see Ah-Mah about it now, Dennis. Now if you guys don't mind, I'd like to save the city in real clothes, please." June wasn't dressed yet. As Dennis and Ray Ray left to give June some privacy, Dennis smirked and said, "You might need sweatpants, then," commenting on June's gain. Unfortunately for him, he earned himself a smack in the face from a magic staff June had nearby for that comment. "OW! Alright, message received! Just hurry up!"

15111221.content:
"Ah-Mah, we-"

"I'm old, not blind, kids. I saw this coming a mile away, literally. That's where they're coming from." Monroe informed Jasmine (Ah-Mah's name) about the breach from the magic world to the human world. "There's trouble brewing there."

"So, what are we waiting for?" Ray Ray was ready to fight. "Let's do this thing!"

"Heel, boy," Monroe said, ironic being that he is the dog. "We need to get two worlds under control at the same time." Ah-Mah nodded and said, "I can handle most of these guys, but I'll need some help."

"I've played through at least a hundred invasion scenarios like this one. I got this." Dennis was ready to help out on the home front (His role-playing expertise was actually what got him onto the team in the first place; according to Monroe, much of the magical knowledge Dennis gained from his games was actual magical knowledge in the show's world.) "You sure you're up for this?" Ah-Mah asked. "As far as field work goes, you're still a rookie." "Relax, I'm all over this." June rolled her eyes and said, "That's Dennis for you. Always ready to get in trouble." "Eh, if he can't take it, you've still got ol' Monroe to bail him out."

Just then, Ray Ray jumped into the conversation, saying, "That means I'm with June, going after the creatures, right?" "Uhh, I'm still sick from yesterday's attack," June said, clutching her stomach.

"Don't worry, I've got a potion that'll boost your appetite and metabolism." Ah-Mah handed her the potion. June drank it and instantly, her stomach started to settle, then rumble.

"Whew, thanks, Ah-Mah. I think I can take it from here." As June left, Ray Ray tried the potion. "I'll need this, too. I bet I could eat more than June."
Ray Ray wouldn't get the chance, however. Once he drank it, he turned green and started belching fire.

"Whoa, that's spicy!" Another burp came out, as did more fire.

"What the... Jasmine! What did you put in that thing?" Monroe yelled. "Huh, looks like I can't substitute toad warts for goblin warts, after all." Dennis then looked green out of disgust from what Ah-Mah said. "And you let June drink that stuff?"

"Yep...and since Ray Ray's reacting weirdly to it, who knows what'll happen to June? We've got bigger problems, though. We have to get rid of these creatures. At least with Ray Ray's fire, we actually have a better chance. This fire is the only thing other than eating those creatures that'll take them down." Dennis then shouted, "Then why didn't we try this before?!" Monroe responded, "If this potion isn't prepared correctly, anything can happen to anyone. We got lucky with Ray Ray."

"Yeah, URP!, but what about June?" Ray Ray asked. As it turns out, June's hunger dramatically increases, but her metabolism remains the same.

As June made her way to the entrance from where the demons were coming from, she saw a few that looked good enough to eat. So she ate them.

"Mmm, it's weird to be so hungry. I feel like a pig for eating so much, but it goes away when I remember I need this." What June didn't realize, however, was that while she wasn't getting fuller, she was still getting fatter. She left before she saw what the potion did to Ray Ray, so she didn't know that she was affected the way she was. That is, until she saw her belly grow.

"Wait, what the? Something's not right. Did the potion go bad?" June was right inside the entrance to the demons' kingdom when she saw herself grow. "Great. I'm still getting bigger and I'm starving! I'd better end this fast, or I could explode!"

"Yeah, I know what you mean, June." June turned around and saw Ashley, a witch June met in an earlier adventure, but she had grown considerably since they last met. She looked as big as June, complete with a double chin forming on her face, and her belly had grown to gigantic proportions.

"Ashley?! Ugh, don't tell me you had something to do with this." (Ashley's magical powers were great enough to have June hand over her responsibilities as Te Xuan Ze to her, just so that June could live a normal life, but Ashley's overall naivete and lack of concentration led June to take her job back.)

"All I wanted to do was stop these candy demons from hurting people," Ashley said. "They looked so yummy, but there are so many. I don't think I can eat them all."

"Don't worry, you've got me to help." Though June was reluctant to work with Ashley, she knew that she had to. "We can do this."

"Okay, let's get eating, partner!" Ashley yelled as she charged into battle, but holding her stuffed belly.

"We are so not partners," June muttered to herself as she followed Ashley.

The girls are just right, but they escape.
151112211121.content:
The girls found a huge laboratory with all manners of potions and smells. Instruments were found on the floor and embedded in the wall. June took one look at the lab and said, "I don't like the looks of this place." Ashley responded, "Not one bit." They looked around for an exit, but heard a loud voice say, "Current weight of object: 175 pounds." They yelped and looked up; June had stepped on a giant scale and activated it.

"175 pounds? Are these really demons that fattening?" June looked at herself in a nearby mirror and saw how big she really was. Her belly jutted out about ten inches from where it used to be and jiggled a bit when she moved. Her face was plumped up to incredible proportions and developed a second chin; it was even nearing a third. June's arms and legs pretty much turned into sausages, as did her fingers. Ashley looked and basically saw the same thing, she even weighed the same. It was as if they were both pumped full of cream by hoses. Ashley, however, liked the feel of her new body.

"Hee hee! I feel like a marshmallow!" Ashley poked her blubber to feel how soft she had gotten and slapped her belly to watch it jiggle. June, meanwhile, had started to enjoy eating constantly. She felt that it was best to just stay fat rather than try to lose the weight. The first potion wore off, so she took a second potion she found in the lab to give her a bigger appetite.

"Whoa, I feel like there's a pit in my belly!" June felt like her stomach was going to collapse upon itself. "I've got to get something to eat!"

"June, are you okay?" Ashley asked. "You seem a little... weird." June said, "I think it's this potion. I'm so hungry, uh, where are those demons?"

Just then, several advanced demons with peppermint armor burst into the room, ready to fight, but June rushed in and quickly devoured some of them. Ashley then looked at the potion June had drank, then drank it herself and ate the rest.

"C'mon, June, let's get the leader!" she yelled. "I'm starving!" They rushed through the hole the demons made, ate several more, and on the other side was the leader, a terrifying mix of every candy imaginable. His lemon yellow eyes glared at the girls, who looked at him as if they hit the jackpot of sweets. (His name is Maltose, by the way. Imagine his voice actor being Diedrich Bader.) He then snapped his fingers, causing a cage of candy canes to fall on the girls and trap them.

"A good meal is so hard to find these days," he said.
151112211121.title: Fat is Where They're At

1511122111211.content:
"Meal?!" The girls said in unison.

"Of course. Why do you think we're attacking the humans? They've been eating candy like it's infinite. We're just returning the favor." Maltose raised his licorice whip and cracked it. "Get these girls more food. If they like eating so much, why not keep them going?"

The girls were then bound by licorice and had chocolate stuffed down their throats. They felt their bodies grow and their bellies bloat considerably. Their skirts and shirts were ready to tear, but they had a plan. Their bodies grew all over, especially where they were bound, eventually snapping the ropes. The girls then ate like never before, chomping as many demons as possible. Maltose looked on with horror, then said with a disgusted look on his face, "I guess I didn't think this through." He tried to attack, but was quickly eaten. As it turned out, Ashley was at least half right; the other demons did stop attacking, but that was because Maltose was a hive leader. The demons lived and acted as one; when Maltose was eaten, the other demons disintegrated.

Eventually, it was found that The Veil fell due to natural failure and that it was iffy that it would be repaired. There was a bright side, however; the Lees found a way to set up several different methods to keep the people from discovering the truth, such as exposed movie lots and holograms, though the latter was less convincing. It was most difficult to explain June's gain, but amnesia techniques helped. The mess would take a while to sort out, but since Maltose's defeat struck fear into evil creatures everywhere, June had time, especially to enjoy being fat.
1511122111211.title: Bright Eyes, Dim Head or How the Girls Won the Day

1521.content:
The cookie was on the kitchen table. And Sabrina ran in the kitchen.

"Come on where is my math book. I used it yesterday when i was busy with my homework."

Suddenly she saw her math book on the kitchen table next to the cookie. She grabbed her math book and pushed it in her backpack and also grabbed the cookie and eat it and after that ran out the front door.

"I need to go to school. Bye aunt Zelda. Bye uncle Quickly. Bye Salem."

"Bye honey. Do your best."

Hilda walked downstairs.

"Oh is Sabrina already gone?"

"You just missed her."

"Strange. I can't remember i liked school so much when i was a teenager. Well that was a few century's ago of course but still... "

She walked to the kitchen and screamed. She ran back and turned to Salem.

"Salem why did you eat that cookie?"

"I did't eat a cookie."

"Do you really think i would believe you? Lie is one of the things you do best."

"I must admit you're right. I'm really good in telling lies. But this time i'm telling the truth. I have an alibi. I was the whole time in the room with uncle Quick."

"Well i must admit that Salem is telling the truth. This time."

"Zelda did you eat that cookie?"

"No i did't. I try to watch my figure."

"But if you did't do it then it must have been... Sabrina. Oh no! She was't supposed to eat that cookie!"


"Where did you leave it?"

"Well on the kitchen table. Why?"

"Well why do leave a magic cookie in a place like the kitchen? If i would have seen a cookie in a kitchen i would also have thought that it would be a normal cookie."

"All right. So maybe it was't my best idea ever."

""What does the cookie to the one who eat it?" Salem asked.

"Well the person who eats the cookie will gain a lot of weight."

"Why should anyone made such a stupid magic cookie?"

"It was't for Sabrina. It was for an old classmate. One that stole my boyfriend."

"I thought you was over that guy."

"I was. But not over her. I thought about a spell to make her fat. My revenge is sweet."

"I think you need to wait with you revenge. Because now Sabina has eaten your cookie."

"And you need to work on a spell to reverse this!"

"Eh that could be a problem. I think i worked on a spell that can' be reversed."

"What do we alway's teach Sabrina? Don't use a spell you can't reverse. And now you did thi... oh!"

"And what do we do with Sabrina?" Salem asked.

"We tell her when she comes back from school."

"Will we still know her when she comes back?"
1521.title: Sabrina was't supposed to eat the cookie
